name: Tavern
desc: Along your journey you spot a nearby tavern, it looks warm and inviting. Upon entering you realise that there are many spare rooms available to use for rest.

name: Plains
desc: You have reached the dry and barren plains where your last and ultimate battle is finally in sight, you may proceed to the evil Maths Monster, take a quick break to prepare yourself or alternatively run away. What will you choose?

name: Mean Multiplication Monkey's Lair
desc: Arghh! It's the Mean Multiplication Monkey! What will you do?!

name: Dangerous Division Dinosaur's Den
desc: Watch out! It's a Dangerous Division Dinosaur! What will you do?!

name: Watchtower
desc: On your travels you see a tall and abandoned watchtower in the distance

name: Merchant
desc: On the way to the next location you come across a lonely travelling merchant. He offers to aid you on your journey by giving you 1 free health point in exchange for knowledge. Do you accept his offer?

name: Traveller's camp
desc: During your adventure you come face to face with another fellow traveller just like you, unfortunately, this traveller only seems interested in attacking you to get to the treasure first. You remember that cheating is never acceptable and must complete a multiplication question to subdue the aggressive travellerâ€¦

name: Bear Cave
desc: Ahhhhh! A huge hungry bear! What will you do?

name: Your camp
desc: This is your camp, Its from here you can venture out on your quest do defeat the Evil Maths Monster.

name: Subtraction Snake's Hideout
desc: Look out! It's the Slimy Subtraction Snake!

name: Angry Addition Alligator's Swamp
desc: Watch out! It's the angry addition alligator!

name: River
desc: On your travels you come across a river.

name: Old Lady's House
desc: Along the way you come across a lonely old lady,
